name: pr-human-response
description: Human review submitted on Claude PR - verifies Claude addresses feedback

parent_issue.title: Add rate limiting to API
parent_issue.body:
## Description

Implement rate limiting to prevent abuse.

## Requirements

- Rate limit per IP
- Configurable limits

## Acceptance Criteria

- [ ] Rate limiting works
- [ ] Limits are configurable

sub_issues.title: Implement rate limiting
sub_issues.body:
## Todos

- [x] Add rate limit middleware
- [ ] Make limits configurable

## Testing

- [ ] Rate limit tests pass

pr.title: Add rate limiting to API

review.body: The rate limit should be configurable via environment variable, not hardcoded.
